testsuite.name: Feature: AdactIn Automation End to End testing
Scenario: To Verify the valid login details

testcase.name: Given User launch the AdactIn Hotel Reservation application using URL as in the test data
testcase.classname: Scenario: To Verify the valid login details

testcase.name: When User enter the User-name in the welcome page
testcase.classname: Scenario: To Verify the valid login details

testcase.name: And User enter the Password in the welcome page
testcase.classname: Scenario: To Verify the valid login details

testcase.name: And User click on the Login button
testcase.classname: Scenario: To Verify the valid login details

testsuite.name: Scenario: To verify whether the check-out date field accepts a later date than check- in date.

testcase.name: Given User launch the AdactIn Hotel Reservation application using URL as in the test data
testcase.classname: Scenario: To verify whether the check-out date field accepts a later date than check- in date.

testcase.name: When User enter the User-name in the welcome page
testcase.classname: Scenario: To verify whether the check-out date field accepts a later date than check- in date.

testcase.name: And User enter the Password in the welcome page
testcase.classname: Scenario: To verify whether the check-out date field accepts a later date than check- in date.

testcase.name: And User click on the Login button
testcase.classname: Scenario: To verify whether the check-out date field accepts a later date than check- in date.

testcase.name: When User select the Location as "Sydney"
testcase.classname: Scenario: To verify whether the check-out date field accepts a later date than check- in date.

testcase.name: And User select the hotel as "Hotel Creek"
testcase.classname: Scenario: To verify whether the check-out date field accepts a later date than check- in date.

testcase.name: And User select Room type as "Standard"
testcase.classname: Scenario: To verify whether the check-out date field accepts a later date than check- in date.

testcase.name: And User select the Number of Rooms as "1 - One"
testcase.classname: Scenario: To verify whether the check-out date field accepts a later date than check- in date.

testcase.name: And User select the Check-in-Date as today plus 7 date
testcase.classname: Scenario: To verify whether the check-out date field accepts a later date than check- in date.

testcase.name: And User select the Check-out-Date as today plus 5 date
testcase.classname: Scenario: To verify whether the check-out date field accepts a later date than check- in date.

testcase.name: And User select the Adult per Room as "1 - One"
testcase.classname: Scenario: To verify whether the check-out date field accepts a later date than check- in date.

testcase.name: And User click on the Search button
testcase.classname: Scenario: To verify whether the check-out date field accepts a later date than check- in date.

testcase.name: Then User Verify the system saying "Check-In Date shall be before than Check-Out Date"
testcase.classname: Scenario: To verify whether the check-out date field accepts a later date than check- in date.

testsuite.name: Scenario: To check if error is reported if check-out date field

testcase.name: Given User launch the AdactIn Hotel Reservation application using URL as in the test data
testcase.classname: Scenario: To check if error is reported if check-out date field

testcase.classname: Scenario: To check if error is reported if check-out date field

testcase.name: And User select Room type as "Standard"
testcase.classname: Scenario: To check if error is reported if check-out date field

testcase.name: And User select the Number of Rooms as "1 - One"
testcase.classname: Scenario: To check if error is reported if check-out date field

testcase.name: And User select the Check-in-Date as "01/07/2019"
testcase.classname: Scenario: To check if error is reported if check-out date field

testcase.name: And User select the Check-out-Date as "28/06/2019"
testcase.classname: Scenario: To check if error is reported if check-out date field

testcase.name: And User select the Adult per Room as "1 - One"
testcase.classname: Scenario: To check if error is reported if check-out date field

testcase.classname: Scenario: To check if error is reported if check-out date field

testcase.name: Then User Verify the system saying "Check-Out Date shall be after than Check-In Date"
testcase.classname: Scenario: To check if error is reported if check-out date field

testsuite.name: Scenario: To Verify Whether location in Select Hotel page are displayed according to the location selected in Search hotel
